General.Name: Niching Industrial
General.Description: Niching Industrial Corporation markets and sells semiconductor, flat panel display, LED, green energy, and nanotechnology products. The company provides low-temperature and die attached sintering Ag paste, printing paste for laser etching, and screen-printing silver paste; and semiconductors, such as heat sinks, capillary wedges, die collet needles, dispensing nozzles, PCBs for solid-state drives and memory modules, substrates for IC packaging, sputtering targets, die attach films, and lead frames, as well as daisy chain, reclaim, dummy, and Al coating wafers. It also offers chip trays, ABS reels, and emboss spacers for the LCD industry; abrasion resistant and flame retardant fibers; and nano porous materials. Niching Industrial Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
